MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 27-DEC-2020 18:27.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the EH26 and EH46 postcode areas of Penicuik and West Linton, affecting properties in Upper Whitfield and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.27pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team are on their way to the local area to investigate the unplanned electricity fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.45pm on Sunday 27 December 2020.
